DOC.brief_title: Treatment Study Carnosine Versus Placebo Gulf War Illness ( GWI )
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Homocarnosine ( beta-alanine - gamma-aminobutyric acid ) one abundant dipeptides brain . It important antioxidant property . Both beta-alanine GABA neurotransmitter , suggest cleavage dipeptide carnosine dipeptidase 1 ( CNDP1 ) may important regulatory function vivo . Drug : Homocarnosine available . Carnosine ( beta-alanine - histidine ) over-the-counter dietary supplement share antioxidant property . We propose oral carnosine would absorb gut , cross blood brain barrier , reduce presume brain oxidant stress participate illness pathology , improve subject health . Hypothesis : Carnosine supplementation 12 week mouth Gulf War Illness subject would improve cognitive outcome compare placebo treatment . Subjects : Gulf War Illness subject met 1996 Fukuda criterion Chronic Multisymptom Illness . Design : Pilot study . Double blind randomized placebo control comparison Week 0 ( Baseline , pre-randomization ) Week 12 ( end study ) Outcomes : This pilot study include included cognitive testing , magnetic resonance image 2-back working memory task , self-report psychometric subjective symptom , tenderness test dolormetry , pain threshold assess reproducibility placebo-treated subject , potential treatment effect active study drug subject . The study outcomes week 0 12 described detail final publish paper extensive supplementary on-line material ( Baraniuk JN et al . Glob J Health Sci . 2013 5:69-81 . PMID:23618477 PMCID : PMC4209301 ) . An improvement accuracy 2-back work memory task 0 12 week primary outcome . Other evaluation secondary outcome .
